description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.wk7Xp5wzUdELgTel]{Stunt and Strike (Ex)}

If you use stunt and strike while @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone}, you can stand up from @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone} without using an action and are immune to the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.QnGpBSHSTiszjPSb]{Off-Kilter} condition until the start of your next turn. If you have Kip-Up, the moxie species trait, or a similar ability, you are also immune to the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone} condition until the start of your next turn.
